common.companyDescription: Leading IT solutions provider delivering innovative technology services to businesses worldwide since 2025.

hero.title: Innovate.
hero.subtitle: We craft cutting-edge digital solutions that empower businesses to thrive in the modern technological landscape. From AI-driven applications to cloud-native platforms, we turn your vision into reality.

services.sectionSubtitle: From concept to deployment, we deliver end-to-end technology services tailored to your unique business requirements.

items.name: AI & Machine Learning
items.description: Intelligent automation and data-driven solutions powered by advanced AI and ML algorithms.

items.name: Web Development
items.description: Custom websites and web applications built with modern frameworks like React, Vue, and Next.js for optimal performance.

items.name: Mobile Apps
items.description: Native and cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android that deliver exceptional user experiences.

items.name: Cloud Solutions
items.description: Scalable cloud infrastructure and migration services using AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud platforms.

items.name: Cybersecurity
items.description: Comprehensive security solutions to protect your digital assets and ensure regulatory compliance.

items.name: UI/UX Design
items.description: Beautiful, intuitive interfaces designed to enhance user engagement and drive conversions.

whyChooseUs.sectionSubtitle: At 'TS Global Tech', we don't just build software – we create technology solutions that drive business growth and innovation. Our team of experts combines decades of experience with cutting-edge technologies to deliver results that matter.

features.title: Agile Development
features.description: Iterative approach ensuring flexibility and continuous improvement throughout the project lifecycle.

features.title: Scalable Solutions
features.description: Future-proof architecture designed to grow seamlessly with your business requirements.

features.title: 24/7 Support
features.description: Dedicated support team available round the clock to ensure your systems run smoothly.

testimonials.sectionSubtitle: Don't just take our word for it – hear from some of our satisfied clients about their experience working with 'TS Global Tech'.

items.quote: 'TS Global Tech' transformed our digital presence completely. Their team delivered our hotel management platform ahead of schedule and exceeded all expectations. The attention to detail and technical expertise is outstanding.
items.author: Anurag Mishra

items.quote: Working with 'TS Global Tech' was a game-changer for our interior-design startup. Their AI solutions helped us automate processes that were consuming 40% of our team's time. Highly recommended!
items.author: Pankaj Kumar

items.quote: The block chain solutions provided by 'TS Global Tech' are top-notch. Their team was professional, responsive, and delivered exactly what we needed.
items.author: Rajendra Kumar

cta.sectionSubtitle: Let's discuss your project and discover how 'TS Global Tech' can help you achieve your business goals with cutting-edge technology solutions.
